topics.body:
Wow, my teacher's a jackass on top of a being shit at his job.

His curriculum is so terrible that the only people that have good grades are the people that cheat and when I brought it up with him how many of the students were cheating he went, "Oh it's easy to tell if someone's cheating, cause they can't pass".  So not only does he not give a shit that the people with A's are cheating, but he's intentionally being a jackass to the students legitimately trying to pass honestly.

. . . What a jackass.
